```{r}
salary <- read_tsv("salary.dat", col_names = c("salary", "sex", "position", "experience"))
```

```{r}
salary %>% ggplot(aes(x = position, y =  salary)) + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~ sex)
```

```{r}
salary %>% ggplot(aes(x = experience, y =  salary)) + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~ sex)
```
